name: EvoVerses
description: EvoVerses aims to blend the perfect fusion between DeFi and GameFi. In order to achieve this, our team is working on creating with Unreal Engine 5, is a realistic 3D Pokemon-like game with story and PvP modes and completely original creatures! The game evolves around mystical and fabulous creatures that we have named Evos, but in addition, our project will also include a set of DeFi tools and services.
